it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class Server
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ServerInterface
    The Server of the game. It contains and handles all the matches, with 2 different connection technologies: Remote Method Invocation (RMI) and Socket
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server()
       throws java.io.IOException
        The constructor of the Server
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is a network error, such as the chosen port is already used or the server is already exported in the Naming of RMI

    • Method Detail

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(java.lang.String playerID,
                      java.net.Socket socket,
                      java.io.ObjectInputStream reader,
                      java.io.ObjectOutputStream writer)
               throws ElementNotFoundException
        Method used to add a player to the waiting view. If the waiting view doesn't exist, the Server creates a new Match, represents by the ServerView class. If the player is trying to reconnect to his match, this method control his user name and add he to the correct ServerView
        Parameters:
        playerID - The user name to add to the view
        socket - The socket with the client connection
        reader - The reader object to read from the socket
        writer - The writer object to write on the socket
        Throws:
        ElementNotFoundException - Thrown if there is a problem with the current waiting view

      • existAnotherPlayer

        public boolean existAnotherPlayer(java.lang.String playerID)
        Method used to know if the chosen user name is already used
        Parameters:
        playerID - The user name to check
        Returns:
        True is the user name is already used, otherwise False

      • playerWasPlaying

        public boolean playerWasPlaying(java.lang.String playerID)
        Method used to know if the user name was connected to a ServerView yet
        Parameters:
        playerID - The user name to check
        Returns:
        True if the player used connected, otherwise False

      • run

        public void run()
        Method used to initialize and run the server

      • startMatch

        public void startMatch()
        Method used to start a match and cancel the corresponding timer

      • sendLoginMessage

        public void sendLoginMessage(ClientInterface client,
                             LoginMessage loginMessage)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method used in a RMI Client to connect to the Server and send to it his user name. If the player was already connect, and this is a reconnection, the server add this client to the correct match
        Specified by:
        sendLoginMessage in interface ServerInterface
        Parameters:
        client - The client who sends this message
        loginMessage - The LoginMessage that contains the chosen user name
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if there is a Network Exception

      • removeMatch

        public void removeMatch(ServerView view)
        Method used to remove an ended match
        Parameters:
        view - The ServerView associated to the ended match. This ServerView will be removed from the Server

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Main method used to start the server
        Parameters:
        args -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is a network error with the server
